short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lightweight yet powerful extension to modify HTTP headers on the fly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the power of FlexHeaders, the ultimate Chrome extension for developers and security-conscious users! Take control of your browsing experience by effortlessly modifying request headers with precision and ease. Whether you're fine-tuning your development environment or safeguarding your online activities, FlexHeaders empowers you like never before.

Key Features:
üõ°Ô∏è Fortify Security: Strengthen your online presence by customizing request headers to enhance privacy and security. FlexHeaders lets you choose which headers to modify, ensuring you're in control of your digital footprint.

üîì Open Source: Whether you want to contribute a new feature or just see what the extension is doing, you can find the source code here: https://github.com/harrisondeo/FlexHeader

üîß Tailored Control: Craft your browsing experience with finesse. From modifying user agents to adding custom headers, FlexHeaders provides you with the tools to shape your interactions with websites and services.

üíº Preset Power: For teams and companies, FlexHeaders offers the ability to export and import presets. Streamline workflows by sharing header configurations across the board, ensuring consistent practices and enhanced efficiency.

üåê URL Filtering: Customize header modifications for specific URLs or domains. FlexHeaders URL filtering feature allows you to apply your settings exactly where they matter, maximizing the impact of your modifications.

üöÄ User-Friendly Interface: FlexHeaders intuitive interface makes it a breeze to tweak headers and set preferences. No coding expertise required‚Äîjust a passion for personalized browsing!

Elevate your browsing experience with FlexHeaders. Become a master of your headers, wield them with ninja-like precision, and surf the web with the confidence of a true header warrior. Try FlexHeaders today and unlock a new realm of customization and security.
